Sentencas: In order to prepare anode material for low-temperature solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs), the mesoporous NiO-SDC was synthesized using a cationic surfactant (cetyltrimethyl-ammonium bromide; CTAB) for obtaining wide triple-phase boundary (TPB).
Titulo: Mesoporous NiO-Samaria Doped Ceria for Low-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: In addition, Ni-SDC anode-supported SOFC single cells with YSZ electrolyte and LSM cathode were fabricated and the performance of single cells was evaluated at 600 degrees C.
Titulo: Mesoporous NiO-Samaria Doped Ceria for Low-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The microstructure of NiO-SDC was characterized by XRD, EDX, SEM, and BET, and the results showed that the mesoporous NiO-SDC with 10 nm pores could be obtained.
Titulo: Mesoporous NiO-Samaria Doped Ceria for Low-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: It was found that the surface area and the electrical performance were strongly influenced by the Ni content in Ni-SDC cermets.
Titulo: Mesoporous NiO-Samaria Doped Ceria for Low-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: After calcined at 600 degrees C, the surface area of NiO-SDC was between 90-117 m(2)/g at 35-45 Ni wt%, which was sufficiently high for providing large TPB in SOFC anode.
Titulo: Mesoporous NiO-Samaria Doped Ceria for Low-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The optimum Ni content for cell performance was around 45 wt% and the corresponding MPD was 0.36 W/cm(2).
Titulo: Mesoporous NiO-Samaria Doped Ceria for Low-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Indeed, the mesoporous NiO-SDC cermet may be of interest for use as an anode for low-temperature SOFCs.
Titulo: Mesoporous NiO-Samaria Doped Ceria for Low-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells
